availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joel D. Browning (Hopkins County saddler and jailer (1840s))

body.p: A Kentucky saddler. Lived in Hopkins County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860. Served as jailer for Hopkins County in 1844 and 1847. Worked as saddler in 1860, with an apprentice.

bibl.p: Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky: Passed at December Session, 1843(Frankfort, Ky.: A. G. Hodges, 1844), 194; Taliaferro P. Shaffner, ed., The Kentucky State Register, for the year 1847 (Louisville: Morton & Griswold, 1847), 103; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 240; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 25.
